title.zh-TW: 利盟租車優惠券大放送

summary.zh-TW: 此票券適用於利盟小客車租賃有限公司任一行程或車資皆可使用
summary.en: This voucher is applicable to any V-LIMO Car Rental service or vehicle rental

content.zh-TW:
1張折價券僅折抵1人,恕無法同時使用2張以上的折價券。
車最多同時使用5張,共乘部分為1張折價券僅折抵1人 機場接送單程僅折抵一張,恕無法同時使用2張以上的折券。
請於預約前告知需使用本券,若完成匯款後恕無法使用折扣,票券請於出發當天繳交提供給司機,如當天未攜帶視同放棄此優惠,請於車上補齊尾款。
折價券如有遺失,恕無法另行補發,本票券恕不找零,不得折換現金。
如發現使用偽造或具有取得疑慮的折價券,本公司有權拒絕折價券的使用。本公司得於沒有告知的情況下變更折價券的使用方式,敬請見諒並請隨時留意本公司 之網頁公告。
此票券為贈品,不得進行轉售。
本券經塗改視同無效,偽造本券依法究辦利盟小客車租賃有限公司保有票券修訂之權益,如有異動述不進行通知。
本票券僅適用來電訂購或官網訂購,其他平台皆不適用。
content.en:
One voucher is valid for one person only; multiple vouchers cannot be used simultaneously.
Maximum 5 vouchers per vehicle. For carpooling, one voucher per person. Airport transfers allow one voucher per trip; multiple vouchers cannot be used together.
Please inform us before booking if you wish to use this voucher. Vouchers cannot be applied after payment is completed. Present the voucher to the driver on departure day. Failure to present voucher means forfeiting the discount; balance must be paid in the vehicle.
Lost vouchers cannot be reissued. No change given; cannot be exchanged for cash.
If counterfeit or suspicious vouchers are detected, the company reserves the right to refuse acceptance. The company may change voucher usage terms without prior notice; please check our website regularly.
This voucher is a complimentary gift and cannot be resold.
Altered vouchers are void. Counterfeit vouchers will be prosecuted. V-LIMO Car Rental Co., Ltd. reserves the right to modify voucher terms without notice.
This voucher is only valid for phone or official website bookings; not applicable on other platforms.
